text: Everything was great, all hot cheesy pizza, my only issue is that I ask for pepperoni on my cheese sticks and I received none on it. I love pizza hut, I'm allergic to the sauce unfortunately so I get my pizza with no cheese and my cheese sticks with pepperoni. I don't understand what the problem with it is!!!

text: I think this was a Pizza Hut in Sylvestor. I tried the salad bar. It was good. Lots of fresh vegetables. I tried the pizza bar. Lots of pepparoni pizza. Lots of men were patrons. The manager ask me how I liked my food and I said it was good.

name: Laila Clements
text:
Best Pizza Hut I've visited!
Very kind staff and very quick service. (Surprising for a Pizza Hut, I know.)
Not a busy restaurant, even on weekends or Friday nights. Great place for a date!
